item.title: [Pi] Respawn help [Lot's of Infromation]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, so in my castle wars, whenever you die, you don’t respawn to your spawn point, you respawn to the normal respawn location, this is in my PlayerAssistant.java

[code] public void giveLife() {
if(CastleWars.isInCw© && !c.inPits && !c.inFightCaves()) {

if (CastleWars.isInCw©) {
if (CastleWars.getTeamNumber© == 1) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Config.SARA_X, Config.SARA_Y, 1);
} else {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Config.ZAMMY_X, Config.ZAMMY_Y, 1);
}
}
if (c.duelStatus <= 4) { // if we are not in a duel repawn to wild
if(!CastleWars.isInCw©){
} else if (c.inWild()) {
movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0);
} else {
movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0);
}
}
[/code]

I added that trying to make it so that you would respawn correctly, in Config.java, I added the Zammy_X and Zammy_Y and stuff, so that shouldn’t be the problem, can anybody help me out?

Read full topic
